channel.title: '06 Legends - Be legendary. Oldschool style
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/06legendsbannermoparscape.jpg[/img]
Hello everyone.
I know you've heard this story countless times before, but we're going to be making a Runescape remake based in the 2006 era of Runescape. We will not be giving up like the others, though, and will carry this out to the end.
I'm sick and tired of remakes that give up after the first couple of days, or remakes that lie about updates for months, and when they finally get to alpha testing, shut it down. I'm not going to be naming any names.
[b][size=16pt]Information[/size][/b]
Base: [b]RuneSource / Azure V3[/b] Client: [b]317 client loading 377 cache[/b]
[size=12pt][b][i]The Team[/i][/b][/size]
[ul][li]TheHolyGrail / Mod Bradley - Server side coder[/li] [li]iz3 legend / Mod Dylan - Server side coder[/li] [li]artem543 / Mod Artem - Client side coder[/li][/ul]
[url=http://www.06legends.tumblr.com][b][size=24pt]Click Here for Latest Updates![/size][/b][/url]
Remember to check our blog frequently to view all of our latest updates!
[b][size=17pt]Media[/size][/b]
[IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/06legendsmopar.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/06legendsrunecrafting-1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/06legendsboneburrying.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2lt3fcj.png[/img]
[b][size=16pt]Credits[/size][/b]
[ul][li]BFMV[/li] [li]Various Azure tutorials on R-S[/li][/ul] [/center]

item.title: '06 Legends - Be legendary. Oldschool style
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

We have a new tumblr blog for updates now, please feel free to check back whenever you’d like to see our newest updates.

Also feel free to ask us any questions you may have on the blog.

Read full topic

item.title: '06 Legends - Be legendary. Oldschool style
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:30, topic:407764”][quote author=TheHolyGrail link=topic=509042.msg3695081#msg3695081 date=1312385116]
Basic herblore has now been added, I hope to finish most of it today.

And I’ve decided on the regular Runescape exp rate, so it will be the full oldschool experience.

Also, pk2play hasn’t worked on anything yet and I haven’t spoken to him for over a day. If I don’t speak to him today, sadly, I might be kicking him out of the team.
[/quote]Why is he even on the team -.-[/quote]Why, what happened?

Read full topic

Basic herblore has now been added, I hope to finish most of it today.

item.title: '06 Legends - Be legendary. Oldschool style
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“TheHolyGrail, post:27, topic:407764”][quote author=Kono-chan link=topic=509042.msg3693960#msg3693960 date=1312313154]

[quote author=TheHolyGrail link=topic=509042.msg3693837#msg3693837 date=1312308559]

My level of not believing you is pretty high, I some how doubt you even went into your client and checked.

From the actual release of Azure on the thread…

Downloads:
Server
Client

Download Azure source that doesn’t need a special client:
Server

Here is a blank 317 client with cache loading and cache included and is packaged version of the client:
Client
[/quote]I didn’t use their client. I’ll send you Client.java via pm.

Unless you converted Azure to 377 it’s a 317 loading 377. :L
[/quote]Yeah I realize that now. The person that said it was a 377 didn’t know what he was talking about apparently. It’s a 317 loading 377.

[quote author=T4_ link=topic=509042.msg3693905#msg3693905 date=1312311040]
06 isn’t oldschool.
[/quote]5 years ago, pretty oldschool in my book.[/quote]

Nothing wrong with that. As long as you fix the fullscreen interfaces, add the tooltips and some other things it’ll look just like a 377.

Read full topic

item.title: '06 Legends - Be legendary. Oldschool style
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

[quote=“Scully, post:20, topic:407764”][quote author=TheHolyGrail link=topic=509042.msg3693644#msg3693644 date=1312298636]

[quote author=LilXCj link=topic=509042.msg3693214#msg3693214 date=1312256726]
Why can’t we all just fucking join together instead of trying to compete for some egotistical programming bullshit?
[/quote]Well are we all using the same base?

I’m not sure if the client changed that much between 377 and 317, especially if he took a source built around a 317 loading 377 to a straight 377.

It did change quite a bit actually between the two, though I was just pointing out that it’s a 317 loading 377, not 377. Here’s some differences between 317 and 377:

317: Grey falador, older barbarian villiage (looks more civilised)
377: White falador, more barbariany barbarian village

317: No farming
377: Farming

317: No white armour
377: White armour

317: No tzhaar
377: Tzhaar

[/quote]Hah I don’t know how I can prove it to you guys… is there a file I can show you or something?

Yes look in your client in the client.java class and see if it has the following:

[code=java]
“crc” + (int)(Math.random() * 99999999D) + “-” + 317);

System.out.println(“RS2 user client - release #” + 317);

aStream_847.writeWord(317); [/code][/quote]It doesn’t.

Read full topic

item.title: '06 Legends - Be legendary. Oldschool style
item.dc:creator: @Scully Scully
item.description:
@Scully wrote:

[quote=“TheHolyGrail, post:19, topic:407764”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=509042.msg3693214#msg3693214 date=1312256726]
Why can’t we all just fucking join together instead of trying to compete for some egotistical programming bullshit?
[/quote]Well are we all using the same base?

[quote author=Kono-chan link=topic=509042.msg3693234#msg3693234 date=1312257327]

I’m not sure if the client changed that much between 377 and 317, especially if he took a source built around a 317 loading 377 to a straight 377.

It did change quite a bit actually between the two, though I was just pointing out that it’s a 317 loading 377, not 377. Here’s some differences between 317 and 377:

317: Grey falador, older barbarian villiage (looks more civilised)
377: White falador, more barbariany barbarian village

317: No farming
377: Farming

317: No white armour
377: White armour

317: No tzhaar
377: Tzhaar

[/quote]Hah I don’t know how I can prove it to you guys… is there a file I can show you or something?[/quote]

Yes look in your client in the client.java class and see if it has the following to determine if it’s a 317:

[code=java]
“crc” + (int)(Math.random() * 99999999D) + “-” + 317);

System.out.println(“RS2 user client - release #” + 317);

aStream_847.writeWord(317); [/code]

Read full topic

item.title: '06 Legends - Be legendary. Oldschool style
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“TheHolyGrail, post:12, topic:407764”][quote author=Scully link=topic=509042.msg3693063#msg3693063 date=1312248017]

[quote author=TheHolyGrail link=topic=509042.msg3693013#msg3693013 date=1312244460]In a 317 loading 377 client you would see the barrows gloves added via Class8, ours are loaded through the cache.

No, you wouldn’t. Item definitions are loaded through the cache; you can edit them using Tom’s cache suite. The class8 way of editing Item definitions is just ‘hard coding’ them.
[/quote]Even so, this is still a 377 loading 377 cache.

Shard = 317.
[/quote]Doesn’t really matter imo. As long as the client is a 377, it’s a 377 in my book.[/quote]

Not trying to be mean here, but unless you converted Shard to 377 then your client is a 317 client loading a 377 cache. :L

Read full topic

item.title: '06 Legends - Be legendary. Oldschool style
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:13, topic:407764”]Look at the date the classes were last edited? Most, if not all, should have been left since they were decompiled. A 317 client has classes dating to 6/13/2005.

Also, good luck! I wish the best of luck to this project.[/quote]Thanks, we’ll keep you guys posted on the updates.

Read full topic

item.title: '06 Legends - Be legendary. Oldschool style
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Look at the date the classes were last edited? Most, if not all, should have been left since they were decompiled. A 317 client has classes dating to 6/13/2005.

Also, good luck! I wish the best of luck to this project.

Read full topic

No, you wouldn’t. Item definitions are loaded through the cache; you can edit them using Tom’s cache suite. The class8 way of editing Item definitions is just ‘hard coding’ them.
[/quote]Even so, this is still a 377 loading 377 cache.
[/quote]
Shard = 317.[/quote]Doesn’t really matter imo. As long as the client is a 377, it’s a 377 in my book.

item.title: '06 Legends - Be legendary. Oldschool style
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

TheHolyGrail:

In a 317 loading 377 client you would see the barrows gloves added via Class8, ours are loaded through the cache.

No, you wouldn’t. Item definitions are loaded through the cache; you can edit them using Tom’s cache suite. The class8 way of editing Item definitions is just ‘hard coding’ them.

Read full topic
